name: Escape Ray
body:
### Welcome to Escape Ray.

I am a programmer who want to be a freelancer. I had more than ten years experience in programming, however I am still a junior coder.

I want to get free, and I will try hard.

### Now

I am in Starbucks in Jinyuan, Beijing. My lovely daughter who is five years old is learning English in Rise school, and I have some time to learn the course from CodeSchool which is about GitHub.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
